description: ENISA Legal (EL) - Legal activities that can compromise the risk posture of an organization.

values.description: Threat of finacial penatly or lost of trust of customers and collaborators due to failure to meet contractual requirements. Failure to meet contractual requirements by third party.
values.value: EL 2 - Failure to Meet Contractual Requirements

values.description: Threat of finacial or legal penatly or lost of trust of customers and collaborators due to improper or illegal use of copyrights material. Illegal usage of File Sharing services.
values.value: EL 3 - Unauthorized use of IPR protected resources

values.description: Threat of illegal use personal data.
Threat of judicial decisions or court orders that may affect the efficacy and effectiveness of the organization.
values.value: EL 5 - Judiciary Decisions or Court Orders

values.description: Threat of finacial or legal penatly or lost of trust of customers and collaborators due to violation of law or regulations.
values.value: EL 1 - Violation of Laws, Regulations, or Legislation
